name: Meteoroids (punchbunny)
description:
Meteoroids is a retro, arcade-style, side-scrolling infinite space shooter, where the only goal is to survive for as long as possible while racking up as many points as you can. It's also my first publicly released game, so I hope you enjoy it!

Being the first project I've ever brought to release, I've decided to put it up for no cost. This is a learning project for me, and part of that process is seeing how others react to the game. Whether you love it or hate it, I appreciate any feedback you might have.

I found the process of making my own game to be ridiculously fun and absolutely intoxicating, so you'd better believe this is just the beginning!

If you have the time, please check out my website as well, punchbunny.com, where I post about gaming in general, as well as updates to development on Meteoroids, as well as other projects.

Thanks for playing!
